summary: Why are so many B-99 bombers from Hibiscus Air Base crashing or simply disappearing? Colonel Price comes up with a terrifying explanation, but will anyone believe him?
cast: Charlton Heston|Tab Hunter|Diana Lynn|Vincent Price|Victor Jory|Charles Bickford|Jackie Coogan|Tyler McVey|David Lewis|John Gallaudet|Eddie Ryder|Harold Dyrenforth|Howard Price|Richard Gaines|Tom Palmer|Arthur Batanides|William Schallert|Robin Morse|Don Donaldson|Don Lutz|Jason Wingreen|Gil Frye|Douglas Marland|Joel Fluellen|Jack Palance
keywords: man wears a swimsuit|colonel|u.s. president|christmas|air force base
title: Forbidden Area
